title: ExecuteMsg
description: This structure describes the execute messages of the contract.

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Updates contract settings ## Executor Only owner can execute this function

spend_limit.description: max allowed amount to spend per distribution

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Adds new distributor address into whitelist ## Executor Only owner can execute this function

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Removes distributor from whitelist ## Executor Only owner can execute this function

oneOf.title: Description
oneOf.description: Distributes rewards to specified contracts ## Executor Only whitelisted address can execute this function

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>

DistributeRewardMsg.title: DistributeRewardMsg
DistributeRewardMsg.description: This structure describes the fields for rewards distribution message.

msg.description: binary msg to execute on receiver contract
